wikipedia_page.main: Randolph Keith Reginald Stewart, 13th Earl of Galloway, Lord of Garlies, Baronet of Corsewell and Burray (14 October 1928 – 27 March 2020) was a Scottish nobleman.

response: *Randolph Stewart, 13th Earl of Galloway, 91, Scottish peer.Earl of Galloway, Lord Randolph Keith Stewart, of Palnackie
